id.description: A unique ID for the activity.

link.description: A self referencing link to the activity.

regarding.description: A link to the resource affected by the activity.

action.description: The action being performed in the activity (e.g. CREATED, UPDATED, DELETED, ARCHIVED, etc.).

actionTime.description: The date and time the action took place.

username.description: The username of the user who performed the action. This may be an API user and not a specific app user. The level of granularity is left to the creator of the activity.

message.description: An activity message which may be used to supply addition information regarding the activity.
